Package SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Shapes

Class Summary
BezierCurve This class draws a Bezier curve using the specified control points.
BezierSurface This class draws a Bezier surface patch.
Box This class draws a 3D wire frame box of the specified width, height and depth centered at the origin.
Circle This class draws a 2d circle of the specified radius centered at the origin.
Line This class draws a 2d line from one point to another.
PixelBox This class draws a solid box of the specified width, height and depth centered at the origin.
PlanarSurface This class draws a rectangular plane surface in the x-z plane, centered at the origin, split into many smaller rectangles, to provide more vertices for the OpenGL lighting calculation.
Shape This is the abstract base class for scene graph nodes that represent actual objects that are drawn.
SolidBox This class draws a solid box of the specified width, height and depth centered at the origin.
Sphere This class draws a solid sphere of the specified radius centered at the origin.
StrokeText A StrokeText object draws a character string with a specified size, orientation and alignment, using a StrokedFont object to draw the individual characters as a sequence of line segments.
